raw_mentions:
Here are the extracted sentences that meet the criteria:

Binding studies showed that the concentration of the SMCY peptide that inhibited the binding of an iodinated standard peptide to purified HLA-B7 by 50% (IC50) was 34 nM, while the IC50 for the SMCX peptide was 140 nM (FIG. 5).
Half-maximal lysis was achieved at a peptide concentration of 10 pM (FIG. 4).
